title: Luis Enrique could hold a historic agreement: PSG are reportedly open to offer a surprising renewal offer to the Spanish coach - World Soccer Talk
snippet: © Alex Grimm/Getty ImagesLuis Enrique, Head Coach of Paris Saint-Germain, celebrates. Paris Saint-Germain have managed to establish themselves as one of the best teams in the world, surprising fans across the board.

title: Luis Enrique open to make new signings at PSG in January – reports - Football | Tribuna.com
snippet: Today, 23 December 2025, 13:42 · Luis Enrique / Getty Images · PSG head coach Luis Enrique has confirmed he is open to strengthening his squad during the January transfer window.

title: Doue hails PSG's 'magnificent' and 'historic' 2025
snippet: Just family and friends.” · Desire Doue labelled Paris Saint-Germain’s 2025 as “magnificent” and “historic” as they ended the calendar year with a 4-0 win over Vendee Fontenay in the Coupe de France.

title: PSG plan to offer lifetime contract for Luis Enrique - reports - Football | Tribuna.com
snippet: Today, 22 December 2025, 10:50 · Luis Enrique / Getty Images · According to Diario AS, PSG are ready to offer Luis Enrique a lifetime contract, with his current deal expiring in June 2027.
